sys_script_include.name: NeedItUtilsNow

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b11e50fe47056110cb798c38c26d43e7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItUtilsNow</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utils Script Include for the NeedIt application.</description><name>NeedItUtilsNow</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItUtilsNow = Class.create();
NeedItUtilsNow.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
isDateToday: function(strDate){
    
    // Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
    var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
    var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
    // Get the date portion of rightnow and testdate (no timestamp)
    var today = rightnow.getLocalDate();
    var istoday = testdate.getLocalDate();
  
    // Compare today and istoday to see if they are the same day
    if(today.compareTo(istoday) == 0){
      return true;
    }
    else {
      return false;
    }
  },
    type: 'NeedItUtilsNow'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-19 20:24:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>b11e50fe47056110cb798c38c26d43e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItUtilsNow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b11e50fe47056110cb798c38c26d43e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-19 20:30:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
